column4: darkmystere: splitting an ISO? that is pretty tough considering
you can try and roast it as two separate files and commingle them afterwards

darkmystere: i have never heard of anybody splitting (that isnt exaclty splitting) an ISO into so many pieces. i know it is possible to turn an ISO into a couple a files and rejoining them but not to the extent you wish to perform
Err, then what sizes should i do..a friend needs this iso but his internet sucks so he asked me to put it on my server so he could get it
